name: Battle Fury
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

descriptions.name: Chop Tree/Ward
descriptions.description: Destroy a target tree or ward.Tree Cast Range: 350Ward Cast Range: 450

descriptions.name: Quell
descriptions.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 60% for melee heroes, and 25% for ranged.

descriptions.name: Cleave
descriptions.description: Deals 40% of attack damage in a cone up to 570 around the target. (Melee Only)
